name: Serif
description:
Make your way in the far west

Survive the bandit to tell your stories by typing the letters in the correct order.

This game was made for the LevelUp game jam 2023 edition in 45h

Theme :  The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

Contrainte LevelUp :  AI generated, 1 clavier pour "n" joueurs

Team (Pêche et Tradition) : Luc Francey, Quentin Meyer, Elio Ramel, Jeremy 

Controls : All letters of the keyboard = Kill the corresponding bandit, kill them in the correct order to discover a story (Generated with ChatGPT)
